properties.displayName: [Preview]: Reserve Bank of India - IT Framework for NBFC
properties.description: This initiative includes policies that address a subset of Reserve Bank of India IT Framework for Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFC) controls. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/rbiitfnbfc-initiative.

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of virtual machine images that have supported Linux OS to add to scope when evaluating if the Log Analytics extension is installed
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of virtual machine images that have supported Windows OS to add to scope when evaluating if the Log Analytics extension is installed
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Allowed Azure Key Vault supported CAs
metadata.description: The list of allowed certificate authorities supported by Azure Key Vault.

metadata.displayName: Allowed elliptic curve names for ECC (elliptical curve cryptography) certificates stored in Key Vault
metadata.description: The list of allowed curve names for elliptic curve cryptography certificates.

metadata.displayName: Allowed disk encryption set to be used with managed disks
metadata.description: The list of allowed disk encryption sets for managed disks.

metadata.displayName: Allowed key types for certificates
metadata.description: The list of allowed certificate key types.

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure Key Vault should disable public network access
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Deprecated effect for policy: Private endpoint should be configured for Key Vault
metadata.description: The Deny effect has been deprecated for this policy given that the simultaneous creation of a Key Vault and its associated private endpoint is not possible. Therefore, Deny prevents the creation of any new Key Vault.

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure Key Vaults should use private link
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Require that double encryption is enabled on Recovery Services vaults for Backup
metadata.description: Check if double encryption is enabled on Recovery Services vaults for Backup.  For more details refer to https://aka.ms/AB-InfraEncryption.

metadata.displayName: Maximum validity (months) for Key Vault certificates
metadata.description: The limit for how long a Key Vault certificate may be valid; Azure best practices recommend against certificates with lengthy validity periods

metadata.displayName: Minimum RSA key size
metadata.description: The minimum key size for RSA certificates.

metadata.description: Mode required for all WAF policies
